Page -2-
Honorable Torbert H. MacDonald
Public financial support as well as recognition are needed to
achieve this goal. I believe therefore that in your discussions
of the proposed legislation you should seriously consider a
Public Broadcasting Act with radio occupying a strong position
witfr television in all titles and provisions.
Sincerely,
//
